mapper.select: SELECT a.USE_STPLAT_ID, a.USE_STPLAT_NM, a.USE_STPLAT_CN, a.INFO_PROVD_AGRE_CN, DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMVNUSERMASTER WHERE ESNTL_ID = a.FRST_REGISTER_ID) AS FRST_REGISTER_NM FROM COMTNSTPLATINFO a WHERE a.USE_STPLAT_ID=#{useStplatId}

SELECT USE_STPLAT_ID, USE_STPLAT_NM, USE_STPLAT_CN, INFO_PROVD_AGRE_CN, DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNSTPLATINFO WHERE 1=1
AND USE_STPLAT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND USE_STPLAT_CN LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY USE_STPLAT_NM DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNSTPLATINFO WHERE 1=1
AND USE_STPLAT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND USE_STPLAT_CN LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNSTPLATINFO (USE_STPLAT_ID , USE_STPLAT_NM , USE_STPLAT_CN , INFO_PROVD_AGRE_CN , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES ( #{useStplatId} , #{useStplatNm} , #{useStplatCn} , #{infoProvdAgreCn} , sysdate() , #{frstRegisterId} , sysdate() , #{lastUpdusrId} )
